name: S&Bert - Mattel Aquarius
description:
Help Bert paint its pyramidal home and avoid its angry roommate snake which doesn’t seem to appreciate the change ! Complete the entire pyramid and Bert moves to a more challenging one, through five levels of difficulty.

S&Bert is inspired by a classic arcade game from the early 1980s. It has been programmed in Microsoft Basic for the Mattel Aquarius Home Computer System.

No RAM expansion needed.

This game was submitted to the Retro Programmers United for Obscure Systems - Mattel Aquarius session - Game Jam of January-April 2023.

CONTROLS

Use the [u], [h], [j] and [n] keys to move diagonally Bert across the pyramid.

You can easily change the keys by modifying the source code.
